response:
"warum gibt es immer noch unternehmen, die unsere personenbezogenen daten sammeln und verkaufen? #datenschutz #privatsphäre #sicherheit"

translation: "why are there still companies that collect and sell our personal data? #dataprivacy #privacy #security"

this post critically examines the issue of companies collecting and selling personal data without proper consent or regard for privacy. the hashtags #datenschutz (data privacy), #privatsphäre (privacy), and #sicherheit (security) are used to reach a wider audience and spark a discussion on the topic.
